entries.meaning: (politics) Someone who makes and spreads slogans.

verbs.description: sloganeer (third-person singular simple present sloganeers, present participle sloganeering, simple past and past participle sloganeered)

entries.meaning: (politics) To make and disseminate slogans; often contrasted with substantive debate.
